author: Nicole Wetsman
title: Sewer systems are a window into the coronavirus pandemic
description: The startup Biobot normally analyzes sewage water for opioids. Now, it’s testing for the novel coronavirus to help communities understand the true prevalence of COVID-19 in their area.
content:
People with COVID-19 shed the virus in their poop 
Photo by Beata Zawrzel / NurPhoto via Getty Images
With limitations on COVID-19 testing making it hard to know how many people actually have the disease, some public health experts are turning to the sewer … [+6282 chars]
